subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Arlen Kantarian, the U.S.T.A. executive who brought blue courts and the women’s prime-time final to the U.S. Open, announced his resignation Thursday.
snippet: Arlen Kantarian, the U.S.T.A. executive who brought blue courts and the women’s prime-time final to the U.S. Open, announced his resignation Thursday.
